column4: Hey I just started using Ubuntu today and I'm having a bit of issues with the terminal and with sound. Could some one possibly help me out with these?
Sound will only work with media files, not on any program or web, and with the terminal when i try to change directory it says that the folder/file doesn't exists
Here's the thing with the terminal, there is no spaces. You have to use it like this: file\ name
Wait a sec, do you have the repo's setup correctly?
Pm me I might me able to help.
whats up dude, what ever you did it last night it got sound running on firefox atleast
Yeah, I mean I'm a step closer but still playing deaf on Nexuiz and Super Tux... :(
Let me know if anyone else gets it working.
bruno123: join my fireflare channel, I'll see if I can still help.
